body.name: Toilet Bidet Non-Electric Bidet Toilet Attachment Dual Nozzles for Frontal/Rear Wash, Adjustable Pressure Control, Bamboo/White (CIBA01)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 12 mins
features: REFRESHING & HYGIENIC WASH: CIAYS bidet attachment with dual nozzles suits Feminine and Posterior Wash. Delivering a better refreshing cleaning experience more than using paper. The feminine mode keeps you clean during monthly cycles and comes in handy for new or expecting mothers.

IMPROVED & ADJUSTABLE WATER PRESSURE: CIAYS’s improved water pressure provides a more gentler yet effective spray. Easily adjust to your preferred pressure through the control knob. Spining the knob allows you to control the water pressure accurately for a more enjoyable and extraordinarily clean!

ULTRA SLIM & COMPATIBLE: CIAYS toilet bidet features an ultra-slim body, only 0.23" thick that is flawlessly compatible with your toilet without leaving a gap. The non-electric bidet attachment fits most standard toilets.

NO LEAKAGE & GREAT QUALITY: CIAYS’s quality brass inlet effectively stops any leakages. This well-made bidet toilet seat attachment is durable for long-time use. Getting rid of leaky problems so you can live a productive life.

PRESERVE & PLANT TREES WHILE SAVING MONEY: Choose CIAYS fresh water spray bidet, and become paper-free and eco-friendly. From saving a piece of tissue to saving a tree furthermore a forest. We Give Back and support the reforestation and restoration of the natural environment.
body.description: Our products are designed and manufactured in line with the standards of the industry. The entire range of products offered by us is very popular in the markets for their afford ability and high durability nature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bidet at a good price and easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: This is the first bidet I have had in my home. I have used them while traveling in other countries before.This Bidet is at a good price and easy to install. I have been putting off getting a bidet because I was worried that cold water would be too cold. I don't even notice the temperature and have no need to plumb in warm water. I will never live in another home without a bidet. Get this or one of the many other options. You will not regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my hey nanny nanny silky smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great intro to bidet on a budget!
reviews.reviewText: This fulfilled our needs at a great price-my poor child was spending 30min plus trying to get “clean” in the bathroom after going #2, and using about a half of a toilet paper roll each time. We tried flushable wipes but they were causing plumbing problems, and taking a shower immediately afterwards was not always practical. So I decided to take the plunge and buy a bidet, but given that this is our first time buying I wanted to start with a cheaper option just in case we ran into problems.It was fairly easy to install, the only leaking I experienced was from a water line that was in place before the we began installation, I recommend making sure all fittings are tight-even the existing ones you did not change, as they can be worked loose when moving them during installation.After I *hand* tightened all the fixtures, I put a large white paper towel on the floor beneath all of the connections to be able to easily monitor for any leaks (a drop of water changes the color and opacity of a paper towel to make spotting leaks a piece of cake).And so far, I’m good to go after fixing that first leak! The water pressure is realllllly strong coming out of the bidet, so I will be turning down the water pressure on the water cut-off, and unfortunately no matter how far back I push the bidet, it causes the toilet seat to sit up waaay too far, even using the supplied bumpers there is a large gap at the front of the toilet seat.My workaround is as follows: I have ordered some white “rubber toilet seat hinge washers”, and I will probably end up using about 3-4 per hinge, to help level things out.All-in-all, it was a great deal, it works as advertised, installation was fairly straightforward and I’m happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: I wish I had known about this during the pandemic I haven’t used toilet paper in almost 2 months, easy to install and very durable. I would recommend it over and over.

reviews.reviewText: It broke and started leaking after 45 days.It's made of a very fragile plastic.I wouldn't buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what was pictured
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I just received it January 11th so I will keep an update on the product. The installment onto the toilet was easy. My issue is the product is not what’s picture. In the picture it shows it being one piece. It actually came in two pieces. That I had to connect without any kind of screw. So it doesn’t stay put together. I had to tape it down. I’m not sure if I have to buy another toilet seat because I’m not able to put the covers on where the toilet seat it’s place. The front part wash completely shoots right out from underneath the toilet seat. So I’m not goin to use that option. It comes with seat bumpers that I’m totally confused about. The back wash works well. Overall easy installation. Looks pretty. It’s doin it job I guess. Maybe you guys would have a better luck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I installed it myself in less than 10 minutes, my kids love it
Você lava e dá descarga. Sem precisar passar a mão. Só para enxugar

reviews.reviewTitle: valvula T nao é padrao brasileiro
reviews.reviewText: para instalar tem que comprar outra valvula com as especificacoes do brasil, as pontas de entrada e saida devem ser de 1/2 e isso da pra comprar em lojas de conexoes hidraulicas, mas vai gastar uns 20,00 a mais.mas o produto em si tem um bom custo beneficio.

O produto vem para o Brasil sem a correta adaptação para os tamanhos de nossos encanamentos. Não há medida hidráulica (rosca) adaptada para este tipo de medida e, portanto o produto torna-se sem uso sob as condições normais. O comprador tem que se virar para tentar as mais mirabolantes idéias de adaptação a fim de que o produto tenha uso. Pena que eu deixei muito tempo para abrir a embalagem e constatar isso, senão teria devolvido de pronto. Agora estou aqui, numa cidade de porte médio sem encontrar possíveis saidas para adaptar a mangueira dele nas nossas medidas.
A conexão é chinesa, diferente da brasileira não encaixa e não vem nenhum adaptador.Quem comprar essa marca vai perder dinheiro.

reviews.reviewTitle: Precisa de adaptador para as conexões brasileiras
reviews.reviewText: Gostei do produto em si, mas não consegui testar pois as conexões não se adaptam as nacionais
